channel.title: Comments on: Don't people have better things to do?

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>I've got a couple of Google Alerts set up to monitor references to my sites.<br /><br />Nothing like massaging the go after all <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded:
I’ve got a couple of Google Alerts set up to monitor references to my sites.

Nothing like massaging the go after all http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />

item.title: By: Paul Mooney
item.dc:creator: Paul Mooney
item.description: <p> hey Matt - how do you know if they are splogging you? I never checked for my site</p>
item.content:encoded: hey Matt – how do you know if they are splogging you? I never checked for my site
